issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: Some queries with count(distinct(..)) fail now in VectorReduceSinkOperator.
fields.summary: VectorReduceSinkOperator: ClassCastException: ~StandardUnionObjectInspector$StandardUnion cannot be cast to ~IntWritable

ATTACHMENT ID: 12672567
Committed to trunk. [~vikram.dixit] This is good to have in 0.14. This is general cleanup to Vector RS (mostly reuses code from RS) and adds additional test.
This has been fixed in 0.14 release. Please open new jira if you see any issues.
